name: Corrupter of the Souls
description:
XXXX: The player must be tired of falling victim to the enemies, so this time the simulation will allow the player to spread corruption. How does that sound?

Jam Version (Unpolished Version)

Also planning on making a post-mortem devlog so look out for that.
